select p.id as id, user_id as userId, u.account as account, u.testRoomNum as testRoomNum, u.applicantNum as applicantNum, period, applicant, candidate, absentee, p.created as created, p.updated as created from person p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id where p.id in (select max(id) from person group by period, user_id) order by user_id, period
